1503550.name: Trine 4: Melody of Mystery Soundtrack
1503550.description: The Melody of Mystery Soundtrack brings the latest Trine adventure to life! Listen closely and embrace the enchanted tunes as the Heroes of Trine venture through incredible dreamscapes, conjured by a mysterious spirit Melody and an alluring music box. This is the official soundtrack to the Melody of Mystery expansion campaign and comes in at 32 minutes, and includes both FLAC and MP3 versions.
